text:
@CDCDirector why the New York hospitals reported regular death ? 

Like Strokes, which I know and I could proof,

as Coronavirus death, 

 to get up the numbers,

and to steal government money.

And the media help them cover the crimes.

Was Governor Cuomo and the Democratic Party behind this
